CPRX Im long on this stock and Im not budging Hard to tell how much of this pull is preholiday offloading related but we all know the fundamentals I am tempted to sell just so I can increase my share count over the several few days but I suspect this will rebound in the next week or two either way Could be quick could be a walk back up but we know where this is headed

CPRX Bought Vericel ASTM at the time when it was 250 and then it popped to 6 on FDA approval of MACI They did what I considered a great offering the next day and the shorts and MMs used it to drive it back to the 2s They screwed with it and accumulated shares so did I for a YEAR Then it popped to 9 12 17 and peaked at 20 Sitting at around 1516 now with plenty of future upside Patience and confidence in what you own can be life changing

CPRX Reminder its common for many stocks to sell off several days leading up to a long holiday weekend because traders dont want to carry risk even if fundamentals are strong Its also common for those stocks to rally again the next trading day This can present excellent profit opportunities So dont get too stressed over this shortterm selloff Hope you find this helpful
